scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist && esbuild public/styles.css public/data.js public/script.js public/category-edit.js public/icon-selector.js public/auth.js --minify --outdir=dist && cp -r public/img dist/ && html-minifier-terser --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --remove-redundant-attributes --remove-script-type-attributes --remove-tag-whitespace --use-short-doctype --minify-css true --minify-js true -o dist/index.html public/index.html && ts=$(TZ='Asia/Shanghai' date '+%y%m%d%H%M') && sed -i.bak "s/id=\"version\">[^<]*/id=\"version\">$ts/" dist/index.html && rm dist/index.html.bak && echo "<!-- build time: $ts -->" >> dist/index.html
